thread.title_full: Senior Manager City Activation - Chicago - Sports Equipment

title: Senior Manager City Activation - Chicago - Sports Equipment
text: Posted/Updated: 10-08-2015 Brief Job Description: Develop, drive, and ensure that execution of a city specific marketing plan is in line with the NAM SBP, key product and brand stories Â– includes local (social) media plan, cooperation with local brand ambassadors, local retail partners and influencers, POS executions, trend and sports marketing asset activations, events, etc.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
